Use traffic flow automation to simplify cloud management, eliminate time-consuming repetitive tasks, and improve reliability and efficiency

Apply for trial Buy now

Simplify cloud management by using process automation

  • Save time and money by using automation
  • Eliminate time-consuming, repetitive tasks
  • Improve reliability and efficiency
  • Work across Azure and third-party cloud services
  • Integrate with any service by using PowerShell scripts
  • Get a highly available automation engine

Save time and lower overhead costs

You can now automate all of those frequent, time-consuming and error-prone cloud management tasks. Azure Automation helps you spend more time on work that adds business value. By reducing errors and boosting efficiency, it also helps to lower your operational costs.

Use existing Windows PowerShell workflows or create your own

In Azure Automation, Windows PowerShell workflows (also known as runbooks) help you to work comfortably by handling the creation, deployment, monitoring, and maintenance of Azure resources and third-party applications. The Azure Automation Runbook Gallery puts samples, utilities, and scenario runbooks at your fingertips, so that you can get your automation tasks up and running quickly. You can use the Runbook Gallery to browse runbooks and import them to your Automation account without leaving the Azure Management portal.

Integrate with the services that you depend on

Automation runbooks work with websites, virtual machines, storage, SQL Server, and other popular Azure services. You can use them with any service that offers public Internet APIs. Intuitive dashboard charts and log records make runbooks easier to monitor.

Deliver more reliable services, faster

By efficiently handling processes that span tools, systems, and department silos, Azure Automation enables you to deliver services faster and more consistently. It’s highly reliable and lets you create checkpoints to resume your workflow after unexpected errors, crashes, and network issues.
